               boolean paid)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        s - Starting date of the reservation.
        e - Ending date of the reservation.
        guid - ID of the user who made the reservation.
        room - Room number this reservation is for.
        paid - Indicates if the reservation has been paid for.

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree(Reserve existing)
        Determine if this reservation conflicts with another.
        Parameters:
        existing - Reservation to compare this one to.
        Returns:

      • isVaildReservation

        Check if a reservation is valid.
        Parameters:
        s - Start date of the reservation.
        e - End date of the reservation.
        Returns:
